title: LF ADC for duo S1+
body: Im a support main, but I can play top/jungle as well. Looking for an adc main who is S1+ and has a wide pool of champs. I can play most supports effectively, and am looking to climb to high gold by the end of the season. Must have skype and must have a non-raging attitude. Add me in game (Nugget Ninja)

replies.body: I am p5 right now i have many smurfs add me in game Taurus
